thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Monday, 29 Jan 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Anhui Tongfeng Electronic to swing to profit in FY 2017

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Anhui Tongfeng Electronic to swing to profit in FY 2017

organizations.name: reuters) - anhui tongfeng electronic co ltd

text:
Jan 29 (Reuters) - Anhui Tongfeng Electronic Co Ltd :
* Sees to swing to net profit at 12.5 million yuan to 18 million yuan in FY 2017 versus net loss at 209.8 million yuan year ago
* Says cost control, less assets impairment loss, investment revenue and subsidy received as main reasons for the forecast
Source text in Chinese: goo.gl/yRTRMK
Further company coverage: (Beijing Headline News)
